extendedInfo.description: Start your car from virtually anywhere with your Android smartphone!âMaking the cloud-connected car a realityâ - Edmunds.com"The coolest thing at the Consumer Electronics Show"- CNBC"Without a doubt, one of the coolest apps I've ever seen"- GIZMODO- Free app includes SmartPark parking spot finder, parking meter reminder, and guest membership in Directed Motor Club.- When combined with a Directed SmartStart module in your car, you can start, lock and unlock your car from virtually anywhere. Receive push or text notification if your car alarm goes off (when installed with a Directed security system). You can even control your compatible home security system in one convenient, easy to use app.- When combined with a Directed SmartStart GPS module, you can also locate your car, share activity on Facebook (because your car needs friends, too), and set safety notifications if your car is speeding or goes where it's not supposed to go. - New for 3.0, add a Directed SmartStart BluetoothÂ® Module for lightning-fast response when closer to your vehicle, even when parked outside of cell network coverage. - Also new for 3.0, cloud-connected features such as SmartSchedule and real-time Status makes the integration of car and smartphone more powerful than ever before.Are you tired of carrying around another clunky remote control on your keychain, or finding yourself out of range when you really need to warm up or cool down your car before getting in? Now you can securely remote start, lock/unlock, or find your car just by pushing a button on your smartphone, using the exciting Directed SmartStart app from Directed, the leader in vehicle security and remote start. And, now the same convenient app also lets you arm and disarm your compatible home security system.Includes these FREE features (no hardware or service plan required):- SmartPark â Ever forgotten where you parked? SmartPark saves the location for you every time you lock your doors with Directed SmartStart.- Directed Motor Club - Locked out? Need a tow? We've got your back. Download the app and sign up for a FREE guest membership to the Directed Motor Club and get 24/7/365 access to the Directed Motor Club's 30,000 licensed service providers.Download the free app and check it out.The simple graphical interface gives you control over the following features of your installed Directed remote start or security/remote start system:- Lock/arm- Unlock/disarm- Remote car starter- Trunk release- Panic or car finder- Aux channelsWith Directed SmartStart GPS, add family-friendly features such as HotSpot and Speed alerts so you get notified if your kids go somewhere they arenât supposed to, or drive unsafely.How do you get Directed SmartStart? Just follow these three simple steps:1) Download the free Directed SmartStart app2) Get SmartStart installed in your car (see directed.com/smartstart for more information and where to buy Directed SmartStart). 3) Set up your SmartStart accountThatâs all there is to it. Download the app and play around with the demo to see how it works.FAQ's:- Is my car secure when I remote start it? Yep, we've been doing this a long time. The car is started, but only you can drive it away. - What is Directed Motor Club? It's our roadside assistance program that is included with every SmartStart Secure service plan. Guest members sign up for free membership and pay only $79 per incident. Secure Plan subscribers get free roadside assistance included with their service plan.http://www.directed.com/SmartStart

reviews.title: Needs lots of improvement
reviews.comment: Every time I open this app asking me for log in or try it I have to press try it every time I am using it with bluetooth dsm50bt rage is very low have to be too close to use phone
reviews.author: Arvinder Khosa

reviews.title: Works fine but.......
reviews.comment: The smart start scheduler doesn\'t start the vehicle on schedule time and doesn\'t alert me to do so either. Chicago had sub zero weather and i want it to start on midnight without me having to wake up, also would be nice to have a 3D vehicle on my phone displaying status, lock, unlock, car running, car off, alarm on, alarm off
reviews.author: Jose Vazquez

reviews.title: Arthur Smith
reviews.comment: I need this App for my windows phone, Had it on my android prior to this phone and it worked just fine for me. Only three stars until you develop an app for windows phones.
reviews.author: Arthur Smith

reviews.title: Needs major UI improvement
reviews.comment: The app works ok but the UI is rather horrible. Would be nice if they followed the holo theme.  Just looks look a port from the iPhone.
reviews.author: Dustin Foreman

reviews.title: Its okay, need improvements
reviews.comment: I have the DSM50BT module installed and the range is very limited. Also, it would be nice to experiance all functions on the BT connection such as alerts, messages and status within the app.  It seems like Directed SmartStart wants customers to purchase the 250 or 200 to experiance all functions. I also think Directed should intergrate the DSM50BT with the network module (250 or 200).  Last, the application splits in 4 big a$$ buttons: lock, unlock, trunk, panic. While I am approching the car, I tend to accidently touch one of the buttons and triggers. This can be annoying... so now when I send a command, I immediately turn my sreen off - so stupid.
reviews.author: Mark Dass

reviews.title: Works sometimes
reviews.comment: Installed the other outdated app and kept crashing. Now installed directed smartstart, and it works like a charm.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hasn\'t worked once yet
reviews.comment: I wouldn\'t wish this system on my worst enemy it says it is connected to my vehicle and working but will not start it, lock it, unlock it or anything it is supposed to
reviews.author: Josh Goetting

reviews.title: GPS is way off.
reviews.comment: Needs update.  Foreclose alot...in bad weather doesn\'t work. Update. Great Idea. Just needs work.
reviews.author: Shad S

reviews.title: Not very good
reviews.comment: Very unreliable service.  I have taken this to the installer several times for a refresh with no luck.  Support is doing very a little to make this work besides waste more of my time.  Even when the service works its very slow and laggy.  Very disappointed, this is my first and last viper/directed product.
reviews.author: Mike Echevarria

reviews.title: It barely works
reviews.comment: The app seems to be getting less stable over time, it needs to be regularly closed and cleared from memory to stay functional.  When fresh, it works fine, but after 2-3 days of use it stops communicating with the car. Buyers beware, smart start is MORE work than a standard car starter!
reviews.author: Neil Will

reviews.title: Needs to be more reliable
reviews.comment: I love the concept of this app, but the execution is slightly flawed. To cut to the chase, the app doesn\'t always start the car on the first attempt, even when the app confirms the the command had been received. If you\'re a distance away, you have no idea whether the command worked or not, and run the risk of shutting off the car by pressing the command again if it did indeed work the first time. Also, sometimes the 2 way confirmation can bug out and only display the okay button to press. App due for update
reviews.author: Ray Z

reviews.title: More apps...
reviews.comment: The app works fine so far needs more notifications on the app like when the car is started and if the doors are locked or unlocked the phone app should work just as good as the transponder does if not better the app  would then be a five star app
reviews.author: Marty- Mar

reviews.title: Horrendous!
reviews.comment: Wow, do these developers & project managers still work in the industry?   The world will be a better place when they find suitable alternative employment.   Seriously, I\'ve reinstalled this App four times. The App locks up after EVERY function is pressed and prior to the performance of the function.   Android 4.1
reviews.author: Frederick Laurence Koberlein Jr.

reviews.title: Dont be cheap
reviews.comment: D.E.I. makes bullet proof products.  Ppl complaining about issues either bought the bt modle (most affordable) and only 20\' of range or have a crap install \"cuz it was cheaper\".  So quit being a baller on a budget
reviews.author: Cody Hodgson

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: I was a little hesitant to buy this addition because of the reviews. After getting it installed. It hasn\'t failed me yet. I love this thing. Got the GPS version of Smartstart.
reviews.author: Vincent Dacoron

reviews.title: No good since last update.
reviews.comment: Is still comes on but when I press the more button it keeps crashing please fix
reviews.author: Rick Daniels

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I live in Illinois and had a friend stat my car from Florida.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jeez update app we already bought your hardware
reviews.comment: Brand new Note 2 app force closes every time I send a signal. Timer need to send signal to start car. Server in your ends needs to send me a text if it loses signal to the car brain. Give me themes. Support your product if you want me to buy one for each new car.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage customer service ..
reviews.comment: No communication with my razr. Despite have every network available.  Multiple installs& uninstalls NOTHING.  Countless calls & emails to C/S nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too laggy
reviews.comment: I love the idea of this app. It works, but way too laggy. There are times it freezes up on me and times out, even in full 4glte service. It is also lacking a widget or the ability to use it from the unlock screen. Motorola Droid RAZR Maxx
reviews.author: Tyson Murphy
